name: Aftercharge
description: AFTERCHARGE is a 3 vs 3 competitive game pitting invisible robots against an invincible security squad in high-octane tactical skirmishes. The robots must sneak around to destroy all the energy extractors on the site while the guards are tasked to spot the attackers and stop them.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® Vista/7/ 8/10 64-bit (latest Service Pack) Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 or AMD Phenom™ X3 865 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 460, ATI Radeon™ HD 4850, or Intel® HD Graphics 5500 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 5 GB available space
